languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с видимым усилием отстраняется и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Умение вести светские беседы — не мой конек, признаю. Что привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс с видимым усилием отстраняется и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Умение вести светские беседы — не мой конек, признаю. Что привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с видимым усилием отстраняется и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Умение вести светские беседы — не мой конек, признаю. Что привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What's bringing you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"
{n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What's bringing you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"
{n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"
{n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"
{n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
{n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希不再问话，眼神明显有意地看着远方。{/n}“我承认，礼貌友好的寒暄并不是我的强项。是什么风把你吹到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的圣所呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希不再问话，眼神明显有意地看着远方。{/n}“我承认，礼貌友好的寒暄并不是我的强项。是什么风把你吹到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的圣所呢？”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは身を引いて、わかりやすく目をそらした。{/n}「我が礼儀正しい世間話が得意でないことは認めましょう。さておき、陛下はなぜ{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}のサンクトゥムへいらしたのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは身を引いて、わかりやすく目をそらした。{/n}「私が礼儀正しい世間話が得意でないことは認めよう。さておき、あなたはなぜ{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}オムニシア{/g}の聖域へ着たのだ？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix macht einen Rückzieher und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich gebe zu, Höflichkeitsgeplauder ist nicht meine starke Seite. Was führt Euch zum Sanctum des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix macht einen Rückzieher und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich gebe zu, Höflichkeitsgeplauder ist nicht meine starke Seite. Was führt Euch zum Sanctum des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix recule et détourne le regard au prix d'un effort visible.{/n} « Je dois admettre que les politesses courtoises ne sont pas mon apanage. Qu'est-ce qui vous amène au sanctum de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recule et détourne le regard au prix d'un effort visible.{/n} « Je dois admettre que les politesses courtoises ne sont pas mon apanage. Qu'est-ce qui vous amène au sanctum de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix retrocede y aparta la mirada con evidente esfuerzo.{/n} «Admito que la charla educada no es mi especialidad. ¿Qué le trae al sanctum del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix retrocede y aparta la mirada con evidente esfuerzo.{/n} «Admito que la charla educada no es mi especialidad. ¿Qué le trae al sanctum del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?».

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix geri çekiliyor ve açık bir çabayla gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Kibar hoşbeşlerle aram olmadığı doğrudur. Sizi {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} Kutağı'na getiren nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls back and looks away with visible effort.{/n} "I do admit courteous small talk is not my strong suit. What brings you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix geri çekiliyor ve açık bir çabayla gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Kibar hoşbeşlerle aram olmadığı doğrudur. Sizi {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in Kutağı'na getiren nedir?"
